Text: Final issue until it's re-released in a month under the same name, same writer, some of the same characters.
Am I getting old 'cause I remember buying the last X-Men #41, in 1995 ... the one that set off the Age of Apocalypse event IIRC?
Thank you for the time in uploading this.. My question is what version is this series? I have nearly every X-Men series and this one seems to have been lost to me.
